resources.string: Your next big break is just a profile away
Please enter your phone number and password to login
Please enter your phone number and password to register

Realization of the patterns of their brain and that of the character's brain is the first thing which makes an actor aware about the reality of the situation/scene.

 Neglecting these patterns is the first thing to abandon the reality of your character.

 Creating a distinction between fictional and non-fictional characters.

 •·– Production based master batch.
 •·– Designed to create a process for you in which you can understand the nature of your body, mind and energy intensely so that are aware about the nature of your character's reality.•·– Designed to enhance your abilities to adapt fictional/non-fictional characters.
 •·– Designed to catalyze your completeness with your ownself.
 •·– Age - 16+
 •·– Production in every six to seven months.
 •·– For all aspiring actors, writers and directors.

 Psychology and physiology are the ways to reach out to an individual's insight.
 The situations may be same for all, but reactions differ so the characters differ.
 That is the major difference between an actor which fits into reality and an actor which does not fit into reality.


 ~Zariya Theatre Group
